params.name: unk_token
params.description: The unknown token. A token that is not in the vocabulary cannot be converted to an ID and is set to be thistoken instead.

params.name: pad_token
params.description: The token used for padding, for example when batching sequences of different lengths.

params.name: word_delimiter_token
params.description: The token used for defining the end of a word.

params.name: do_lower_case
params.description: Whether or not to accept lowercase input and lowercase the output when decoding.

params.name: target_lang
params.description: A target language the tokenizer should set by default. target_lang has to be defined for multi-lingual,nested vocabulary such as facebook/mms-1b-all.

params.name: *kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments passed along to PreTrainedTokenizer
